    • About Jerry Van Leeuwen


    Jerry has been helping families and individuals find and secure their dream homes for many years now. His family has been his driving force and they inspire him to maintain a strong work ethic. Jerry’s previous experience as a paramedic has helped him develop a passion for the positive aspects of life.
